dict.string: Granting camera permission, you can scan the QR code and Barcode you need with unlimited, please allow authorization.Don't worry,we will not colllect and store your information and will not upload it to the server.

Granting album permission, you can save the code to the album and share it with your friends, please allow authorization.Don't worry,we will not colllect and store your information and will not upload it to the server.

Granting contacts permission, you can save the code to the album and share it with your friends, please allow authorization.Don't worry,we will not colllect and store your information and will not upload it to the server.
Our app will NOT track or keep any record of your activities, authorizing tracking however can help us offer no cost services funded by personalized advertising.
